trans-unit.source: Implements the `ResolveAssemblyReference` task.
trans-unit.target: 实现`ResolveAssemblyReference`任务。

trans-unit.source: Use the `ResolveAssemblyReference` element in your project file to create and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: 使用`ResolveAssemblyReference`项目文件以创建和执行此任务中的元素。

trans-unit.source: For usage and parameter information, see [ResolveAssemblyReference Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关用法和参数信息，请参阅[ResolveAssemblyReference 任务](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the assembly extensions that will be considered during references resolution.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置将在引用解析期间考虑的程序集扩展。

trans-unit.source: The default extensions are .dll and .exe.
trans-unit.target: 默认扩展名为.dll 和.exe。

trans-unit.source: The assembly extensions that will be considered during references resolution.
trans-unit.target: 将在引用解析期间考虑的程序集扩展。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the extensions that will be considered when searching for related files.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置将在搜索相关文件时考虑的扩展名。

trans-unit.source: The default extensions are .pdb and .xml.
trans-unit.target: 默认扩展名是.pdb 和.xml。

trans-unit.source: The extensions that will be considered when searching for related files.
trans-unit.target: 将在搜索相关文件时考虑的扩展名。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the App.Config file path.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 App.Config 文件路径。

trans-unit.source: If this property is specified, the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.AutoUnify%2A> property must be false.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定此属性，则<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.AutoUnify%2A>属性必须为 false。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.AutoUnify%2A>

trans-unit.source: The App.Config file path.
trans-unit.target: App.Config 文件路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the assembly names to resolve into full paths and to find dependencies for.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要解析为完整路径，并为之查找依赖项程序集名称。

trans-unit.source: The assembly names can either be simple or strong names.
trans-unit.target: 程序集名称可以是简单或强名称。

trans-unit.source: The assembly names to resolve into full paths and to find dependencies for.
trans-unit.target: 要解析为完整路径，并为之查找依赖项程序集的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of fully qualified assembly paths to find dependencies for.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要查找其依赖项的完全限定程序集路径的列表。

trans-unit.source: The list of fully qualified assembly paths to find dependencies for.
trans-unit.target: 要查找其依赖项的完全限定程序集路径的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the resulting dependency graph is automatically treated as if there were an App.Config file passed in to the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.AppConfigFile*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定，好像到传递了 App.Config 文件，是否自动处理最后得到的依赖项图<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.AppConfigFile*>属性。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.AppConfigFile*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this property, see [ResolveAssemblyReference Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)
trans-unit.target: 有关此属性的详细信息，请参阅[ResolveAssemblyReference 任务](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resulting dependency graph is automatically treated as if there were an App.Config file passed in to the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.AppConfigFile*> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果自动处理生成的依赖项关系图，如同没有到传递了 App.Config 文件<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.AppConfigFile*>属性。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.AppConfigFile*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of assemblies, which must be absolute file names or project-relative file names, to use for the search and resolution process.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置程序集，它们必须是绝对文件名或项目相对文件名，要用于搜索和解析过程的列表。

trans-unit.source: Assemblies in this list will be considered when the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.SearchPaths%2A> property contains {CandidateAssemblyFiles} as one of the paths to consider.
trans-unit.target: 此列表中的程序集将被视为时<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.SearchPaths%2A>属性包含 {CandidateAssemblyFiles} 作为要考虑的路径之一。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.SearchPaths%2A>

trans-unit.source: The list of assemblies to use for the search and resolution process.
trans-unit.target: 要用于搜索和解析过程的程序集列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a switch that determines how dependencies are determined, and whether or not a dependency is copied locally.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置确定如何确定依赖关系和依赖关系本地复制的交换机。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if when determining if a dependency should be copied locally one of the checks done is to see if the parent reference in the project file has the Private metadata set or not.
trans-unit.target: 如果确定是否应复制依赖本地完成的检查之一时，项目文件中的父引用了 Private 元数据，则返回 true 设置与否。

trans-unit.source: If that metadata is set then we will use that for the dependency as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置该元数据然后我们将使用这也依赖项。

trans-unit.source: If the metadata is not set then the dependency will go through the same checks as the parent reference.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置元数据依赖项会通过与父引用相同的检查。

trans-unit.source: One of these checks is to see if the reference is in the GAC.
trans-unit.target: 其中一项检查是查看该引用是否位于 GAC 中。

trans-unit.source: If a reference is in the GAC then we will not copy it locally as it is assumed it will be in the gac on the target machine as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果引用位于 gac 中然后我们将不将其复制本地因为假定它将目标计算机上的 gac 中。

trans-unit.source: However this only applies to that specific reference and not its dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 但是这仅适用于该特定的引用，而不适用于其依赖项。

trans-unit.source: This means a reference in the project file may be copy local false due to it being in the GAC but the dependencies may still be copied locally because they are not in the GAC.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着项目文件中的引用可能是由于其位于 gac 中复制本地 false 但因为它们不位于 GAC 中，依赖关系可能仍本地复制。

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior for RAR and causes the default value for this property to be true.
trans-unit.target: 这是 RAR 的默认行为，并导致此属性为 true 的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Returns false if we will still check project file references to see if they are in the GAC and set their copy local state as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们仍将检查项目文件引用，以查看它们是否位于 GAC 中，并根据需要设置其复制的本地状态，则返回 false。

trans-unit.source: However for dependencies we will not only check to see if they are in the GAC but we will also check to see if the parent reference from the project file is in the GAC.
trans-unit.target: 但是为依赖关系我们不会仅签如果它们是否位于 GAC 中，但我们还将检查以查看项目文件的父引用是否位于 GAC 中。

trans-unit.source: If the parent reference from the project file is in the GAC then we will not copy the dependency locally.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目文件的父引用位于 gac 中然后我们不会复制本地的依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple parent reference and ANY of them does not come from the GAC then we will set copy local to true.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个父引用，并且其中任何不是来自 GAC 然后我们将设置复制本地为 true。

trans-unit.source: Returns all files in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.ResolvedFiles*>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.ResolvedDependencyFiles*>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.RelatedFiles*>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.SatelliteFiles*>, and <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference"></xref> properties that have the `CopyLocal` item metadata with a value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回中的所有文件<> *1>， <> </> *1>， <> </> *1>， <> </> *1>，和<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference"></xref>具有属性`CopyLocal`项元数据的值为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: All files in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.ResolvedFiles*>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.ResolvedDependencyFiles*>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.RelatedFiles*>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.SatelliteFiles*>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.ScatterFiles*> properties that have the `CopyLocal` item metadata with a value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有文件<> *1>， <> </> *1>， <> </> *1>， <> </> *1>，和<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.ScatterFiles*>具有属性`CopyLocal`项元数据的值为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.ScatterFiles*>

trans-unit.source: Executes the `ResolveAssemblyReference` task.
trans-unit.target: 执行`ResolveAssemblyReference`任务。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if task execution succeeded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果任务成功执行;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the items written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的项写入到磁盘。

trans-unit.source: The items written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 项写入到磁盘。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether dependencies will be found (<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>) or only primary references will be found (<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定是否将查找依赖项 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>) 还是将查找主引用仅 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if dependencies will be found; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if only primary references will be found.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果将查找依赖项;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果仅将查找主引用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether related files such as .pdb files and .xml files will be found.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定是否将找到相关的文件，如.pdb 文件和.xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if related files such as .pdb files and .xml files will be found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果将找到相关的文件，如.pdb 文件和.xml 文件;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether satellite assemblies will be found.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定是否将找到附属程序集。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true.`
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `true.`

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if satellite assemblies will be found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果将找到附属程序集;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the serialization assemblies will be found.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定是否会找到序列化程序集。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the serialization assemblies will be found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果将找到序列化程序集;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of items representing XML files that contain the full framework for the profile.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示包含配置文件的完整框架的 XML 文件的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Normally nothing is passed in here, this is for the cases where the location of the xml file for the full framework is not under a RedistList folder.
trans-unit.target: 通常在此处传递执行任何操作时，这是完整的 framework 的 xml 文件的位置不在的 RedistList 文件夹下的用例。

trans-unit.source: Format of the file is like: etc. ``` <FileList Redist="MatchingRedistListName" > <File AssemblyName="System" Version="2.0.0.0" PublicKeyToken="b77a5c561934e089" Culture="neutral" ProcessorArchitecture="MSIL" FileVersion="2.0.40824.0" InGAC="true" /> // etc. </FileList> ``` Items in this list must specify the "FrameworkDirectory" metadata to associate an redist list with a particular framework directory.
trans-unit.target: 文件格式就像是︰ 等。 ``` <FileList Redist="MatchingRedistListName" > <File AssemblyName="System" Version="2.0.0.0" PublicKeyToken="b77a5c561934e089" Culture="neutral" ProcessorArchitecture="MSIL" FileVersion="2.0.40824.0" InGAC="true" /> // etc. </FileList> ```此列表中的项必须指定"FrameworkDirectory"元数据，以将 redist 列表与特定的框架目录相关联。

trans-unit.source: If the association is not made an error will be logged.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有进行关联错误将记录。

trans-unit.source: The reason is, The logic in RAR assumes if a FrameworkDirectory is not set it will use the target framework directory.
trans-unit.target: 原因是中的逻辑在 RAR 假设如果未设置 FrameworkDirectory，则它将使用目标框架目录。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of items representing XML files that contain the full framework for the profile.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示包含配置文件的完整框架的 XML 文件的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of folders which contain a RedistList directory which represent the full framework for a given client profile, for example:%programfiles%\reference assemblies\microsoft\framework\v4.0
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文件夹包含 RedistList 目录表示给定客户端配置文件，example:%programfiles%\reference assemblies\microsoft\framework\v4.0 的完整框架的列表

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of folders which contain a RedistList directory which represent the full framework for a given client profile
trans-unit.target: 返回文件夹包含 RedistList 目录表示给定客户端配置文件的完整框架的列表

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the names of the subsets of the specified target framework.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，其中包含指定的目标框架子集名称。

trans-unit.source: Provides a set of names that, if seen in the TargetFrameworkSubset list, causes TargetFrameworkSubsets to be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 提供一组名称，如果看到在 TargetFrameworkSubset 列表中，将导致 TargetFrameworkSubsets 被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A string value that contains subset names.
trans-unit.target: 包含子集名称的字符串值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the task should look for and use additional installed assembly subset tables (also known as Subset Lists), which are found in the SubsetList directory under the provided TargetFrameworkDirectories.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定任务是否应查找和使用其他已安装的程序集子集表 （也称为子集列表） 下提供 TargetFrameworkDirectories SubsetList 目录中找到。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if additional assembly subset tables are used; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用其他程序集子集表;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the `ResolveAssemblyReference` task should ignore additional installed assembly tables found in the RedistList directory underneath the provided <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.TargetFrameworkDirectories*> (<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>) or should search for and use these installed assembly tables (<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定是否`ResolveAssemblyReference`任务应忽略在下方提供的 RedistList 目录中找到的其他安装的程序集表<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.TargetFrameworkDirectories*>(<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>) 或应搜索，然后使用这些安装的程序集表 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>)。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.TargetFrameworkDirectories*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the task should ignore the additional installed assembly tables; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the task should search for and use the additional installed assembly tables.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果任务应忽略的其他安装的程序集表;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果任务应搜索并使用其他已安装的程序集的表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether to ignore the framework attribute when checking if an assembly is compatible with the targeted framework.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个标志，指示是否忽略 framework 特性，检查如果程序集时是否与兼容的目标框架。

trans-unit.source: Returns the flag.
trans-unit.target: 返回的标志。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether to ignore the version information on the framework assembly and actually resolve the framework assembly from the currently targeted framework.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个标志，指示是否忽略 framework 程序集的版本信息和实际解决当前目标框架中的 framework 程序集。

trans-unit.source: Flag applies if the primary reference is a framework assembly.
trans-unit.target: 标志适用如果主引用为 framework 程序集。

trans-unit.source: Returns the flag.
trans-unit.target: 返回的标志。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"></xref> that represents a list of XML files that contain assemblies that are expected to be in the target subset.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"> </xref>表示包含预计会在目标子集中的程序集的 XML 文件的列表。

trans-unit.source: This is the format of the file: ``` <FileList Redist="ClientSubset" > <File AssemblyName="System" Version="2.0.0.0" PublicKeyToken="b77a5c561934e089" Culture="neutral" ProcessorArchitecture="MSIL" FileVersion="2.0.40824.0" InGAC="true" /> etc. </FileList> ``` Items in this list may optionally specify the "FrameworkDirectory" metadata to associate an InstalledAssemblySubsetTable with a particular framework directory.
trans-unit.target: 这是该文件的格式︰``` <FileList Redist="ClientSubset" > <File AssemblyName="System" Version="2.0.0.0" PublicKeyToken="b77a5c561934e089" Culture="neutral" ProcessorArchitecture="MSIL" FileVersion="2.0.40824.0" InGAC="true" /> etc. </FileList> ```此列表中的项 （可选） 可以指定要将 InstalledAssemblySubsetTable 与特定的框架目录相关联的"FrameworkDirectory"元数据。

trans-unit.source: If there is only a single TargetFrameworkDirectories element, then any items in this list that do not have the "FrameworkDirectory" metadata will be treated as though the metadata is set to the lone (unique) value passed to TargetFrameworkDirectories.
trans-unit.target: 如果只是单一 TargetFrameworkDirectories 元素，然后此列表中没有"FrameworkDirectory"元数据的任何项将被视为好像元数据设置为传递给 TargetFrameworkDirectories 的唯一 （唯一） 值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"></xref> list of XML files.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"> </xref> XML 文件的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of XML files that contain assemblies that are expected to be installed on the target machine.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含应在目标计算机上安装的程序集的 XML 文件的列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of XML files that contain assemblies that are expected to be installed on the target machine.
trans-unit.target: 包含在目标计算机安装的程序集的 XML 文件的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the list of directories which contain the redist lists for the most current framework which can be targeted on the machine.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置目录包含可能目标计算机的最新框架的 redist 列表的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of directories which contain the redist lists for the most current framework which can be targeted on the machine.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含可能目标计算机的最新框架的 redist 列表的目录的列表。

trans-unit.source: If this is not set Then we will looks for the highest framework installed on the machine for a given target framework identifier and use that.
trans-unit.target: 如果这未设置的则我们将如下所示的最高框架给定的目标框架标识符的计算机上安装和使用这些。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the target framework profile we are targeting, for example Client, Web, or Network
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置目标框架配置文件的目标，例如客户端、 Web 或网络的名称

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the target framework profile we are targeting, for example Client, Web, or Network
trans-unit.target: 返回的目标框架配置文件目标，例如客户端、 Web 或网络的名称

trans-unit.source: Gets related files, such as .xml and .pdb files with the same base name as a reference.
trans-unit.target: 获取相关的文件，如.xml 和.pdb 文件具有相同基名称的作为引用。

trans-unit.source: The related files.
trans-unit.target: 相关的文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the *n*th order paths to dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 获取*n*级依赖项路径。

trans-unit.source: The *n*th order paths to dependencies.
trans-unit.target: *N*级依赖项路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of all primary references resolved to full paths.
trans-unit.target: 获取已解析为完整路径的所有主引用的列表。

trans-unit.source: The list of all primary references resolved to full paths.
trans-unit.target: 已解析为完整路径的所有主引用列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of resolved SDK references which contain the sdk name, sdk location and the targeted configuration.
trans-unit.target: 解决 SDK 引用，其中包含的 sdk 名称，sdk 的位置和目标的配置列表。

trans-unit.source: These locations will only be searched if the reference has the SDKName metadata attached to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果此引用具有附加到它的 SDKName 元数据，将仅搜索这些位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets any satellite files found.
trans-unit.target: 获取找到的任意附属文件。

trans-unit.source: The satellite files will have the `CopyLocal` item metadata with a value of `true` if the reference or dependency that caused this item to exist also has a `CopyLocal` item metadata set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 附属文件都将`CopyLocal`项元数据的值为`true`如果引用或导致此项存在的依赖项也具有`CopyLocal`项元数据设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Any satellite files found.
trans-unit.target: 找到的任意附属文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the scatter files associated with one of the given assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 获取与某个给定的程序集关联的散点文件。

trans-unit.source: The scatter files associated with one of the given assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 与某个给定的程序集关联的散点文件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the directories or special locations that are searched to find the files on disk that represent the assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 指定目录或特殊位置，其中进行搜索以找到磁盘上表示程序集文件。

trans-unit.source: The directories or special locations that are searched to find the files on disk that represent the assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 目录或特殊位置，其中进行搜索以找到磁盘上表示程序集文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the serialization assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 获取序列化程序集。

trans-unit.source: The serialization assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 序列化程序集。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether no messages are logged.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定是否未记录任何消息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if no messages are logged; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果未记录任何消息;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a file name that indicates where to save the intermediate build state for this task.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示用于保存此任务的中间生成状态位置的文件名称。

trans-unit.source: The file name that indicates where to save the intermediate build state for this task.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于保存中间位置的文件名称生成对此任务的状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets one item for every distinct conflicting assembly identity, regardless of the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.AutoUnify*> property.
trans-unit.target: 为每个非重复冲突程序集标识，无论的值如何获取一个项<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.AutoUnify*>属性。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveAssemblyReference.AutoUnify*>

trans-unit.source: The items include culture and PKT that were found and that did not have a suitable bindingRedirect entry in the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 这些项包括区域性和 PKT，找到和应用程序配置文件中没有合适的 bindingRedirect 条目。

trans-unit.source: The items that correspond to distinct conflicting assembly identities.
trans-unit.target: 项对应于不同的冲突程序集标识。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the runtime we are targeting, for example, 2.0.57027.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置运行时我们面向的，例如，2.0.57027 的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the runtime we are targeting, for example, 2.0.57027.
trans-unit.target: 返回运行时我们面向的，例如，2.0.57027 的名称。

trans-unit.source: A "v" may be prefixed to the name.
trans-unit.target: "V"可能的名称作为前缀。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to the target framework directory.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置目标框架目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: This property is required to determine the `CopyLocal` status for resulting items.
trans-unit.target: 此属性需要来确定`CopyLocal`生成的项的状态。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, no resulting items will be have a `CopyLocal` value of `true` unless they explicitly have a `Private` metadata value of `true` on their source item.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性，没有生成的项将具有`CopyLocal`值`true`除非显式`Private`的元数据值`true`在其源项上。

trans-unit.source: The path to the target framework directory.
trans-unit.target: 目标框架目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target framework moniker being targeted, if any.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置目标框架名字对象，如果有的话。

trans-unit.source: This is used for logging purposes.
trans-unit.target: 这用于日志记录目的。

trans-unit.source: Returns the target framework moniker being targeted, if any.
trans-unit.target: 返回目标框架名字对象，如果有。

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty string by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display name of the target framework moniker being targeted, if any.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置目标框架名字对象，显示名称，如果有的话。

trans-unit.source: This is used only for logging.
trans-unit.target: 这仅用于日志记录。

trans-unit.source: Returns the display name of the target framework moniker being targeted, if any.
trans-unit.target: 如果有，则返回作为目标的目标框架名字对象的显示名称。

trans-unit.source: A list of target framework subset names that will be searched for in the target framework directories.
trans-unit.target: 将在目标框架目录中搜索的目标框架子集名称的列表。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the project target framework version used for reference filtering.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于引用筛选的项目目标框架版本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The project target framework version used for reference filtering.
trans-unit.target: 用于引用筛选的项目目标框架版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the preferred target processor architecture used for resolving Global Assembly Cache (GAC) references, which can have a value of `x86`, `IA64`, or `AMD64`.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于分析全局程序集缓存 (GAC) 引用的首选的目标处理器体系结构，它可以具有的值`x86`， `IA64`，或`AMD64`。

trans-unit.source: The preferred target processor architecture used for resolving Global Assembly Cache (GAC) references.
trans-unit.target: 用于解析全局程序集缓存 (GAC) 引用的首选的目标处理器体系结构。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string value specifying the behavior when a mismatch between the target processor architecture and the architecture of a primary reference.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个字符串值，指定当目标处理器体系结构与主引用的体系结构不匹配时的行为。

trans-unit.source: When this is “Error”, an error will be logged for a mismatch.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是"错误"，错误将记录不匹配。

trans-unit.source: When this is “Warning”, a warning will be logged for a mismatch.
trans-unit.target: 如果这"警告"，将不匹配记录警告。

trans-unit.source: When this is “None”, no error or warning will be logged for a mismatch.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是"None"，将不匹配记录没有错误或警告。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string value of “Error”, “Warning” or “None”.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串值的"错误"、"警告"或"None"。
